ResearchProjectDef.label: Neolithic Blueprint
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft a neolithic technology blueprint. To be able to craft a neolithic blueprint you need to have a good understanding of the technology in the neolithic tech era.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medieval Blueprint
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft a medieval technology blueprint. To be able to craft a medieval blueprint you need to have a good understanding of the technology in the medieval and previous tech era.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Industrial Blueprint
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft a industrial technology blueprint. To be able to craft a industrial blueprint you need to have a good understanding of the technology in the industrial and previous tech era.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Spacer Blueprint
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft a spacer technology blueprint. To be able to craft a spacer blueprint you need to have a good understanding of all known technology.
